rule_desc: Account number length is not 18 digits
Bank code is not among BARC and HSBC
Transaction date is not future date
Credit limit is in range 60000 to 70000
Transaction Amount should be whole number
Credit on hold has valid boolean values
Payment Type is not wired for cash and cheque payment method
Account id is unique
Bank Id should be unique
Transaction Identifier is unique
Entity image id should not be null
Bank name should not be null
Cheque number should not be null for cheque payment method
Transaction date should not be null
Compare payment source and target data
Postal code length is not 5 digits
Cheque number is not populated for payment methods other than cheque
Transaction currency should be within set of debit currency values
Cheque number is 6 digits long
Transaction Date should be in yyyy-mm-dd format
